games.summary: TORONTO -- —Anthony Edwardsscored 13 of his 30 points in the fourth quarter,Bones Hylandhad 20 points and theMinnesota Timberwolvesovercame an 18-point deficit to beat theToronto Raptors128-126 on Wednesday. Minnesota trailed 77-59 after the Raptors scored five straight points to start the third quarter.

games.summary: HOUSTON -- —Derrick Whitemade six 3-pointers and scored 28 points and theBoston Celticsused a big third quarter to build the lead and cruise to a 114-93 win over theHouston Rocketson Wednesday night. White led the way during that run, scoring the first eight points, with two 3-pointers.
